body_html: I expect that users might have cuDNN at any of those two locations since we offer deb and tarball downloads. Ideally those two locations should be checked automatically and CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH could be reserved for unusual cuDNN install paths.
body_text: I expect that users might have cuDNN at any of those two locations since we offer deb and tarball downloads. Ideally those two locations should be checked automatically and CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH could be reserved for unusual cuDNN install paths.
body: I expect that users might have cuDNN at any of those two locations since we offer deb and tarball downloads. Ideally those two locations should be checked automatically and `CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH` could be reserved for unusual cuDNN install paths.
